tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive site information including coordinates, antenna specifications, terrain data, and infrastructure details for RF planning.

site_ids.description: Array of site identifiers to retrieve data for

error_messages: Site not found: One or more site_ids do not exist in the database.
Invalid coordinate system: Use supported systems like WGS84, UTM, or local grid references.
Data access denied: Insufficient permissions to access site survey data.
usage: Provide array of site_ids and set boolean flags to control data inclusion. Returns comprehensive site characteristics for RF modeling.

site_locations.description: Site coordinates in specified coordinate system

antenna_heights.description: Antenna heights above ground level in meters

terrain_elevations.description: Ground elevation at each site in meters

clutter_types.description: Land use classification for each site
